Song.title: Come Praise And Glorify
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Tim Chester and Bob Kauflin (C) 2011 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Come [A]praise and glori[G]fy our God The [D]Father of our [A]Lord In [A]Christ he has in [G]heav'nly realms His [D]blessings on us [A]poured For [F#m]pure and [A]blameless [D]in His sight He [F#m]destined [A]us to [D]be And [A]now we've been [G]adopted through His [D]Son eternal[A]ly
Chorus: [E/G#] To the [F#m]praise of Your [E]glory To the [A]praise of Your mercy and [D]grace To the [F#m]praise of Your [E]glory [Gadd2]You are the [D]God who saves [A G D A ]
Verse 2: Come [A]praise and glori[G]fy our God Who [D]gives His grace in [A]Christ In [A]Him our sins are [G]washed away Re[D]deemed through sacri[A]fice In [F#m]Him God [A]has made [D]known to us The [F#m]mystery [A]of His [D]will That [A]Christ should be the [G]head of all His [D]purpose to ful[A]fill
{new_page} Verse 3: Come [A]praise and glori[G]fy our God For [D]we've believed the [A]Word And [A]through our faith we [G]have a seal The [D]Spirit of the [A]Lord The [F#m]Spirit [A]guaran[D]tees our hope Un[F#m]til re[A]demption's [D]done Un[A]til we join in [G]endless praise To [D]God the Three in [A]One
Chorus: [E/G#] To the [F#m]praise of Your [E]glory To the [A]praise of Your mercy and [D]grace To the [F#m]praise of Your [E]glory [Gadd2]You are the [D]God who saves [A G D A]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 come praise and glorify our god the father of our lord in christ he has in heavnly realms his blessings on us poured for pure and blameless in his sight he destined us to be and now weve been adopted through his son eternally chorus to the praise of your glory to the praise of your mercy and grace to the praise of your glory you are the god who saves verse 2 come praise and glorify our god who gives his grace in christ in him our sins are washed away redeemed through sacrifice in him god has made known to us the mystery of his will that christ should be the head of all his purpose to fulfill verse 3 come praise and glorify our god for weve believed the word and through our faith we have a seal the spirit of the lord the spirit guarantees our hope until redemptions done until we join in endless praise to god the three in one chorus to the praise of your glory to the praise of your mercy and grace to the praise of your glory you are the god who saves
